_header: Thine father was a bond man
Subjects: sermons, verse in; vanity, against worldly
_description: High birth is of no value — one quatrain in a sermon

BodLatTheD1.Transcription:
þin ffadere was a bond mandþin moder curtesye non
                    canEuery beste þat leuyth nowIs of more fredam þan
                    woe

Fletcher,  Alan J. 
             “Selected Verses from Bodleian Library MS Lat. Th. D.1.” 
             Neuphilologische Mitteilungen
